context: Consultation provided for all pediatric disease,
review: My daughter was having a bad cough and I was worried. I was wondering who is a good paediatric available to show ,that's when my spouse searched in Google and got information about Dr Ganesh Kamath, after seeing the positive reviews we decided to go and consult the doctor and thankfully it was a wonderful experience. Dr Ganesh patiently listened to all the symptom and advised this is the issue. Such a soft spoken doctor. He will only prescribe medicine if required. I would highly recommend parents if they want to consult a paediatric please approach Dr. Ganesh

The doctor is very attentive and thorough, and always explains the cause of symptoms, course of treatment and action properly to us. 

We will very confident with him and even our child who is generally scared of going to hospitals feels comfortable with him.
We recommended the doctor to a family friend and they also had a very pleasant experience for their kids treatment.

Thank you so much.

review: We have been visiting Dr. Ganesh Kamath since 4 years now. He gives time to examine his young patients before prescribing a course of treatment. I have shifted to Whitefield but don't think twice before taking my son back to Koramangala for a checkup with him when needed.
